title: Master Chief in Fortnite?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.03.20
description:
Greg and Tim talk about the rumor of Master Chief coming to Fortnite, Sea of Thieves gets a battle pass in 2021, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:10 - Housekeeping
The Kinda Funny Gamescast is live and predicting the Game Awards on youtube.com/kindafunnygames AND remember, we’ll be live reacting to the Game Awards next Thursday on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Kevin, please show. You can vote on our FCF Jerseys - kindafunny.com/fcf. Plus, the FCF store is live if you want a Wild Aces t-shirt or sweatshirt.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:00 - Master Chief in Fortnite?!
00:18:40 -  - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:21:56 -  Xbox Game Pass Just Getting Warmed Up, Fraser Gilbert @ Pure Xbox
00:25:30 - Sea of Thieves Adding Seasons and a Battle Pass in 2021, Richard Wakeling @ GameSpot
00:27:30 - The Vita Store isn’t Working, Ian Walker @ Kotaku
00:31:50 - Haven Review Round-Up
00:35:00 - Business Bits from Twinfinite
00:42:38 - Out today
00:38:12 -  Ad
 Reader mail   -
00:44:30 - I received my Collectors edition of Cyberpunk 2077 early yesterday - James (@verySuperjamous)
00:56:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
